hero.tagline: We are committed to providing excellent legal service & products.
hero.title: Welcome to NP Consultant Indonesia
hero.text: Welcome to NP Consultant Indonesia, where we are not just your lawyers or legal consultants but also your strategic business partners. Our practice areas include mining, energy and natural resources, corporate and commercial, M&A, investment, immigration, employment, due diligence and compliance, civil and commercial litigation, family law, and others. We bring you the pinnacle of Indonesian legal expertise tailored to your unique needs.

whyChoose.story: Founded by Gesiu Nicholas Manurung and Yuliana Pertiwi Siagian, two highly credentialed advocates with respective 14 years of field expertise, NP Consultant Indonesia was built on a strong academic and professional foundation. What started as a vision has grown into a full-scale operation, serving a diverse clientele—from individuals grappling with legal complexities to multinational corporations seeking to navigate the Indonesian market.

advantages.title: Extensive Expertise
advantages.text: Our practice spans a broad spectrum of legal fields, from Corporate & Commercial law to Energy & Natural Resources, all the way to Litigation and Dispute Settlement. This comprehensive service offering makes us a one-stop legal solution for all your needs.

advantages.title: International Exposure
advantages.text: We bring global perspectives to local challenges, thanks to our team’s international experience.

advantages.title: Cultural Insight
advantages.text: Our deep roots in Indonesia enable us to bridge the gap between legal practice and cultural nuance.

advantages.title: Client-Focused
advantages.text: We offer tailored billing options and efficiently managed cases to meet our clients’ diverse needs.

servicesDescription: In an increasingly complex regulatory environment, NP Consultant Indonesia stands as a beacon of legal excellence, providing bespoke legal solutions finely tuned to the nuances of Indonesian law. Our team is skilled in a wide range of practice areas, each handled with the careful attention to detail that sets our firm apart.

address: Kel. Kedungdoro, Kec. Tegalsari Surabaya, Jawa Timur 60261
